channel.title: News on IntraSurge
channel.description: Recent content in News on IntraSurge

item.title: IntraSurge Presents at ESA 2025 Annual Meeting
item.description: The Annual Meeting of the European Surgical Association (ESA) is a leading forum for advancing clinical and experimental surgery, surgical education, and the socioeconomic dimensions of surgical care.

item.title: IntraSurge team at ORSI surgical days
item.description: We had the pleasure of attending the Surgical AI Days 2025 in Belgium â€” a three-day event that brought together clinicians, researchers, and industry experts working at the intersection of surgery and artificial intelligence. As part of the academic track, we were invited to give a talk highlighting our ongoing research.

item.title: SPIE Medical Imaging 2025 conference
item.description: The IntraSurge team had an exciting presence at SPIE Medical Imaging 2025, where Ronald de Jong presented two of our latest research projects.
